mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_resource_type (name, description, disposable) VALUE (#{name}, #{description}, #{disposable})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_resource_type, t_resource, t_resource_usage USING t_resource_type LEFT JOIN t_resource ON t_resource.type_id = t_resource_type.id LEFT JOIN t_resource_usage ON t_resource_usage.resource_id = t_resource.id WHERE t_resource_type.id = #{id}
